alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Snowy and Judith Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 20 at 7:43AM MDT until April 20 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations 1 to 4 inches. * WHERE...The Highwood, Little Belt, and Snowy Mountains, Cascade County below 5000ft, and Judith Basin County and Judith Gap. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous.
info.instruction: To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Cascade County below 5000ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Snowy and Judith Mountains
